title: Long Wait Time
body: So I've been waiting over an hour for a game in ranked. AN HOUR. this is ridiculous. When they announced the dynamic queue I knew this would be a problem but my god I didn't know it would be THIS bad. All the dynamic queue did was force people to choose support when they don't want to just to get a game. Fuck Riot.

replies.body: If you're playing during the day on a weekday, you can usually expect long waiting times. The majority of the player base are at school/uni/work during this time.
